de.tum.in.tumcampus.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.cards.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CafeteriaMenuCard, EduroamCard, FirstUseCard1, FirstUseCard2, MVVCard, NewsCard, NextLectureCard, NoInternetCard, RestoreCard, TuitionFeesCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all cards

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Card.ProvidesCard
      Interface which has to be implemented by a manager class to add cards to the stream

      • Card

        public Card(android.content.Context context)
        Card constructor for special cards that don't have a preference screen

      • Card

        public Card(android.content.Context context,
    java.lang.String settings)
        Standard card constructor.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        settings - Preference key prefix used for all preferences belonging to that card

      • Card

        public Card(android.content.Context context,
    java.lang.String settings,
    boolean wearDefault,
    boolean phoneDefault)
        Card constructor that can set special default values for wear and phone
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        settings - Preference key prefix used for all preferences belonging to that card
        wearDefault - True if notifications should by default be displayed on android wear
        phoneDefault - True if notifications should by default be displayed on the phone

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard()
        Should be called after the user has dismissed the card

      • discard

        protected void discard(android.content.SharedPreferences.Editor editor)
        Save information about the dismissed card/notification to decide later if the card should be shown again
        Parameters:
        editor - Editor to be used for saving values

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Must be called after information has been set Adds the card to CardManager if not dismissed before and notifies the user

      • shouldShow

        protected boolean shouldShow(android.content.SharedPreferences prefs)
        Determines if the card should be shown. Decision is based on the given SharedPreferences. This method should be overridden in most cases.
        Returns:
        returns true if the card should be shown

      • fillNotification

        protected android.app.Notification fillNotification(android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder notificationBuilder)
        Should fill the given notification builder with content

      • getIntent

        public android.content.Intent getIntent()
        Returns:
        Should return the intent that should be launched if the card or the notification gets clicked, null if nothing should happen

      • getTitle

        protected java.lang.String getTitle()
        Gets the title of the card

      • isDismissable

        public boolean isDismissable()
        Tells the list adapter and indirectly the SwipeDismissList if the item is dismissable The restore card is not dismissable.

      • getSettings

        public java.lang.String getSettings()
        Gets the prefix that is used for all preference key's belonging to that card
        Returns:
        Key prefix e.g. "card_cafeteria"

      • hideAlways

        public void hideAlways()
        Sets preferences so that this card does not show up again until reactivated manually by the user
